member.name: T:C1.CollectionView.C1CursorCollectionView`2
member.summary: Base class for cursor-like collection views.
member.remarks: This class is appropriate for wrapping data services that return the data in pages and give a token to get the next page, like Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, etc.
member.typeparam: The type of the items in the collection.

member.name: P:C1.CollectionView.C1CursorCollectionView`2.InternalList
member.summary: Gets or sets the list that hold the items to be returned in the public api.

member.name: M:C1.CollectionView.C1CursorCollectionView`2.GetPageAsync(`1,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: When overriden in an inherited class it returns the items in the page as well as a token to the next page.
member.param: The token of the requesting page, pass null if no pages had been requested so far.
The desired number of items to be returned.
member.returns: A tuple containing the items and a token to the next page.

member.name: P:C1.CollectionView.C1CursorCollectionView`2.HasMoreItems
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether more items can be loaded.

member.summary: Loads more items.
member.param: Specifies the desired number of items to be loaded.

member.name: M:C1.CollectionView.C1CursorCollectionView`2.RefreshAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes the cached data and loads the whole collection from scratch.
